description: Caudalie Beauty Elixir is a facial mist inspired by the youth elixir that was created especially for the Queen Isabelle of Hungary. Given that this product contains 100% natural extracts, it infuses the skin with a vitamin shot that instantly brightens the skin. Provided that this has been a backstage make-up artist favorite for setting make-up, this is a cult product for many Hollywood stars. This elixir tightens the pores, sets make-up and boosts radiance, hence making it the perfect ally for make-up lovers and those with dull skin. With this in mind, this iconic product is one to have always available to ensure that the skin is perfect.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, shake well before using to mix both phases. Secondly, vaporize Caudalie Beauty Elixir onto the face, avoiding the eyes. This mist can be used both as a make-up setting spray or a skin freshener so, as a result, you can use it every time you want.

description: SVR Sebiaclear Micro-Peel Smoothing Renewal Water was specially formulated for sensitive and oily skin prone to acne. It is, in essence, able to target persistent imperfections and help refine and renew the skin. With a powerful combination of active ingredients, it has, as star ingredients, Niacinamide and Salicylic Acid. These actives can not only help eliminate skin imperfections such as blackheads, enlarged pores, and spots but also limit bacterial proliferation and soothe irritated acne-prone skin. In addition, because Salicylic Acid has also a keratolytic action, this water can gently exfoliate the skin helping remove dead cells from its surface. This stimulates cell renewal and lends the skin an even and also smoother appearance. With a pleasant non-greasy and non-sticky watery texture, this delicately scented water can refine and renew your complexion and leave your skin with a pleasant feeling of cleanliness and freshness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply SVR Sebiaclear Micro-Peel Smoothing Renewal Water using a cotton pad or the palm of your hand. Apply to the whole face concentrating on areas of imperfections.

description: Eucerin DermatoCLEAN Hyaluron Toner is a mild, alcohol-free toner designed to be applied after cleansing, to refresh the skin and help it maintain its natural moisture balance. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive, this formula is enriched with APG Complex, an extra mild cleanser, and Gluco-Glycerol, a powerful hydrating active that helps the skin retain moisture. The skin is toned and supple, fully prepared for the next step in the skincare routine.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Eucerin DermatoCLEAN Hyaluron Toner to the face, neck and décolletage using a cotton wool pad. Distribute the product with gentle swipes, in order to prepare the skin for the next step in the skincare routine.

description: Avène Gentle Toning Lotion is a delicate daily toner suitable for all skin types, including sensitive. Formulated without alcohol, parabens, or soap, this hypoalergenic and non-comedogenic formula soothes and softens the skin with each application, all the white creating a protective film that shields the complexion from external aggressions. The skin is beautifully hydrated and delicately fragranced, for long-lasting comfort and radiance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Shake bottle well before use. Apply Avène Gentle Toning Lotion with a soft cotton pad after thoroughly cleansing the face. Do not rinse.

description: Caudalie Vinopure Purifying Toner is a non-comedogenic and non-photosensitizing formula that purifies, mattifies and cleanses the skin, simultaneously. Thanks to a vegan powerful composition, this product is able to tighten the pores, visibly decrease the number of imperfections and reduce oily shine, all at the same time. Furthermore, the Caudalie Vinopure Purifying Toner delivers all of these benefits through a dermatologically tested formula that contains ingredients such as Lavender, Natural Salicylic Acid and Organic Grape Water. Even more, this product is part of the Vinopure collection, a range of products by Caudalie that focuses on treating oily and prone to acne skin through the power of natural and sustainable compositions. All of the products from this line have vegan formulas, without synthetic fragrance and mostly natural-origin ingredients. In addition, all the packaging in the Vinopure range uses recyclable plastic and glass.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Caudalie Vinopure Purifying Toner as part of your morning and evening routine after cleansing your skin. Apply it by gently dabbing a soaked cotton pad or by splashing it directly with your hands. Do not rinse. Complement its use with other products from the same range in order to achieve optimal results.

description: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Toner is an astringent, micro-exfoliating toner. It tightens the pores and prevents them from clogging thanks to the active ingredient LHA, which regulates the secretion of sebum, cleanses and exfoliates. Created for enlarged pores, uneven skin texture, for oily skin with imperfections, this tonic ensures that pores are tightened and the skin's surface is evener. It works well for acne, blackheads, excess shine of the skin and sebum production regulation.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

LHA does a micro-exfoliation in order to remove dead cell buildup which tends to cause blemishes.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply La Roche-Posay Effaclar Toner by soaking a cotton pad with the lotion and applying it to the face and neck on cleansed skin.

description: Caudalie Vinoclean Moisturizing Toner comforts, moisturizes, and tones the skin providing several benefits in just one gesture. Firstly, it refreshes the skin and removes all traces of the cleanser and impurities left behind. This means it is perfect to maximize your cleansing routine. But that's not all it can do. With a unique formula, it can also hydrate, tone, and soothe the skin. It has, as star ingredients, Organic Rose Water and Vinolevure. The Organic Rose Water can both soothe and soften the skin. While the Vinolevure can deeply hydrate the skin and promote a healthier skin barrier. Respecting the skin's natural balance it leaves the skin clear and comfortable and prepared to receive the full benefits of the next skincare product. In addition, due to the natural organic rose water delicate fragrance, it also promotes a relaxing moment enveloping you in a sense of well-being.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply three pumps of Caudalie Vinoclean Moisturizing Toner> to a cotton pad. Use wiping motions to gently remove the leftover impurities, makeup, and product residue and complete your cleansing routine. It does not require rinsing with water.

description: Bioderma Sensibio Tonique Soothing Moisturising Toning Lotion is a sensitive skin toning lotion which helps to soothe the skin after the cleansing process. With rhamnose and cucumber water, it instantly calms the skin and prevents redness and tightness. The skin becomes softer, more hydrated and comfortable.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Bioderma Sensibio Tonique Soothing Moisturising Toning Lotion onto a cotton pad and cleanse the skin until all impurities are removed, repeating this process as many times as needed. No need to rinse after.

description:
Esthederm Intensive Propolis+ Zinc Serum-Lotion is a facial lotion that helps to perfect and mattify the skin at the same time. The texture is lightweight and refreshing, with a non-oily formula that is perfect for normal to oily skin types, including acne-prone skin.
Concentrated as serum and fluid as a toner, this lotion delivers incredible ingredients to the skin. To begin with, propolis extract provides the skin with soothing and purifying properties, and also with a healing, anti-inflammatory and antioxidant action. At the same time, zinc gluconate helps to balance sebum secretion and absorbs excess oil on the skin. Equally important, the base of the formula is patented cellular water, a booster that enhances the results of your skincare, optimizing the energetic environment of skin cells. Each application grants not only immediate comfort but also a shoot of powerful actives that work to improve the appearance of your skin. As a result, it helps to reduce the appearance of imperfections, mattifies the skin and visibly reduces pores.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Esthederm Intensive Propolis+ Zinc Serum-Lotion onto clean and dry skin, using a cotton pad and avoiding the eye area. Then, follow with your favorite serum and/or moisturizer.

description: APIVITA Tonic Lotion Soothing & Moisturizing Face Toner is the perfect toner for those suffering from dehydration. The blend of greek thyme honey and lavender together with panthenol helps to calm the skin and reduce discomfort. Additionally, the rose fruit infusion offers an anti-pollution action that helps to protect the skin from an urban lifestyle. These characteristics make it a perfect addition to any routine for skin with dehydration, being suitable for all skin types. In one gentle step, the skin is both soothed and hydrated, with a 97% natural formula.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply APIVITA Tonic Lotion Soothing & Moisturizing Face Toner by soaking a cotton pad and using wiping motions on a previously cleansed face.

description: Martiderm Balancing Toner is an oil control toner that simultaneously hydrates the skin. Formulated with salicylic acid and prebiotics, this toner helps to regulate oil production and to balance the skin. In view of the characteristics of oily skins, a toner that is intended to balance this skin type needs to both control excess oil and to guarantee that the hydration levels are on point. To this end, this formula combines both soothing and hydrating active ingredients with sebum-control ones, to guarantee that the skin is hydrated and free from excess oil. A clinical study has evaluated the efficacy of this toner and concluded that within 24 hours the skin was 17% more hydrated, but within one month the oil was also reduced by 30%.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, cleanse your skin and pat it dry. Then, soak a cotton pad with Martiderm Balancing Toner and swipe it over your skin, avoiding the eye contour. Don't rinse the toner and then follow with your favorite moisturizers and serums.

description:
Biretix Oil Control Solution 100ml (3.38 fl oz) is a meticulously formulated solution to offer triple-action benefits: mattifying, sebum-regulating, and pore-minimising. At the heart of its formulation is a synergistic blend of glycolic and mandelic acid. These ingredients work together to exfoliate the skin, therefore helping to unclog pores and promote a luminous and even complexion. Another significant benefit of this action is the capability to reduce post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation. Furthermore, one of the standout qualities of this solution is its impressive ability to reduce shine by 95% right from the first application. Last but not least, Pore Reductyl in the formula helps reduce the appearance of pores while rose extract provides soothing properties. Given that, this product offers a solution for those who struggle with oily and acne-prone skin as it targets shine and refines the pores without stripping the skin of its essential moisture.
The ultra-light texture ensures that the product is rapidly absorbed without leaving behind a sticky or greasy residue. Accompanied by a pleasant fragrance, it is a delight to incorporate into your skincare regimen. With its optimal pH balance, it's also gentle enough to be suitable for those with sensitive skin. In conclusion, this solution controls excess sebum, refines skin texture, and minimizes pores.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Biretix Oil Control Solution 100ml (3.38 fl oz) to clean, dry skin of the face with a cotton pad or reusable alternative.

description:
coxir Ultra Hyaluronic Toner 150ml (5.07floz) is a hydrating toner designed to deliver both immediate and sustained moisture throughout the day, ensuring the skin remains soft and hydration levels are restored. Infused with hyaluronic acid, known for its ability to attract and retain water, this toner effectively boosts skin hydration and plumps the skin. So, the result is skin that feels smooth and soft to the touch. This refreshing toner's benefits are further amplified by a plant complex that includes ingredients such as aloe vera. This ingredient not only moisturizes the skin but also delivers essential vitamins and offers soothing benefits. Additionally, witch hazel complements the formula by providing additional soothing effects, ensuring the skin remains calm, refreshed, and perfectly hydrated after each use.
In essence, this toner completes the skin cleansing process while helping to restore the skin's moisture levels. Suitable for all skin types, especially those suffering from dehydration, this product helps maintain moisturized, supple, and naturally radiant skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Dispense coxir Ultra Hyaluronic Toner 150ml (5.07floz) onto the palms or a cotton pad. Then, gently spread it across clean skin of the face and neck and massage until it fully absorbs. Alternatively, soak multiple cotton pads with the toner and place them onto the skin, leaving them on for about 5 minutes.

description: Diadermine Soothing Facial Tonic consists of a facial tonic indicated for more sensitive skins that also need a hydration boost. In this way, this product helps to tone the skin, gently cleanse it and maintain its natural moisture levels. On the other hand, this toner softens the skin leaving it smoother than before! Regarding its composition, it contains about 84% natural ingredients. In addition, it is enriched with Pro-vitamin B5, an ingredient with the ability to hydrate and regenerate the skin while improving smoothness and elasticity. It is also ideal for healing small skin blemishes. In short, this product is gentle on the skin but has the ability to cleanse it, leaving it more toned, hydrated, refreshed and soothed.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Pro-Vitamin B5, also known as Panthenol, helps to hydrate the skin while regenerating it, improves elasticity and most importantly helps to heal minor blemishes in the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Diadermine Soothing Facial Tonic with the help of a cotton pad soaked in this solution. Cleanse the entire face and neck in the morning and evening to remove impurities and tone the skin.

description:
Ziaja Acai Berry Antioxidation Face Toner 200ml (7.0 fl oz) is a refreshing toner that effectively moisturizes and tones the skin while providing antioxidant protection. Infused with açaí berry extract, this toner is rich in antioxidants that help protect the skin from environmental aggressions, such as pollution, which can lead to signs of aging. The formula also includes a vitamin C derivative, which boosts collagen production and offers additional antioxidant protection, helping to keep the skin youthful and radiant. Additionally, hyaluronic acid helps restore the skin's water balance, ensuring that your complexion remains hydrated and plump throughout the day.
So, this toner not only tones and refreshes the skin but also delivers protection against environmental effects, aiding in preventing aging signs. Moreover, thanks to its convenient spray presentation, it can also be used as a mist throughout the day, offering an instant feeling of freshness and hydration. This versatility makes it a perfect addition to any skincare routine, allowing you to enjoy its benefits at any time. Lastly, the toner leaves a pleasant scent on the skin, enhancing the overall sensory experience.
how_to_use:
How to use
Dispense an appropriate amount of Ziaja Acai Berry Antioxidation Face Toner 200ml (7.0 fl oz) onto a cotton pad and then gently wipe it across the skin of the face. Alternatively, spray the product onto the face whenever desired for a refreshing feeling.

description:
APIVITA Aqua Beelicious Perfecting & Hydrating Toner 200ml (6.76 fl oz) boosts your hydrating routine! For that purpose, this toner is infused with a cocktail of thirst-quenching ingredients. Flowers' extract, Honey, Aloe, and Hyaluronic acid work synergically to boost of moisture to the skin, thus leaving it noticeably plumper, softer, and smoother. In addition, this toner contains Prebiotics which work to soothe the skin and reduce redness and irritations. At the same time, the formula features a Rosehip infusion and patented propolis extract, which provide powerful antioxidant properties and, consequently, offer protection against environmental aggressions. 
All in all, this hydrating toner is the perfect addition to your skincare routine in order to offer a burst of hydration and freshness. To put it differently, this toner leaves the skin healthier and brighter.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply APIVITA Aqua Beelicious Perfecting & Hydrating Toner 200ml (6.76 fl oz) morning and evening on cleansed skin, avoiding the eye area.

description: Filorga Oxygen-Peel Re-Oxygenating Micro-Peeling Lotion is an exfoliating toner which helps to renew the skin in order to promote a smoother skin surface and boost radiance. This micro-peeling toner reoxygenates the skin thanks to the ability of biomimetic polysaccharides to capture oxygen. The skin doesn't become dry thanks to the hyaluronic acid in the formula.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Filorga Oxygen-Peel Re-Oxygenating Micro-Peeling Lotion in the evening with a cotton pad to the face, neck and décolleté, avoiding the eye contour area.

description: Esthederm Osmoclean Hydra-Replenishing Fresh Lotion is a refreshing toning lotion that helps to remove the last traces of make-up and impurities from the skin. On the other hand, this lotion has a great moisturizing action for the skin while leaving it cleaner and fresher. Furthermore, this luxurious product is ideal for soothing the visible dry effects on the skin caused by overly mineralized water. Finally, its smooth, light and refreshing texture clings to the skin in order to remove all impurities deep in the pores. With an excellent tolerance and safety, this product is indicated for all skin types leaving them without any discomfort, more clean and hydrated.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Esthederm Osmoclean Hydra-Replenishing Fresh Lotion to the face using a cotton pad soaked with the product after cleaning with Esthederm Osmoclean Hydra-Replenishing Cleansing Milk.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
G9 Skin White in Milk Toner is a hydrating toner that offers multiple benefits to the skin. That said, this incredible formula not only provides optimal moisture levels but also improves skin's radiance and the appearance of wrinkles. To begin with, the formula features a complex of nine brightening and nourishing ingredients, with Niacinamide and Milk Protein extract included. Then, it also contains a blend of moisturizing and soothing ingredients, amongst which are Hyaluronic acid, Almond oil, and Ceramide NP. And lastly, this formula boasts the anti-aging properties of Adenosine to improve the appearance of wrinkles. This powerful combination of exceptional ingredients results in astonishing results!
Furthermore, this product it's incredibly versatile as you can use it as a toner or as a makeup primer, whether in the morning or the evening routine. In conclusion, this toner helps to brighten and nourish the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply G9 Skin White in Milk Toner on a cotton pad or reusable alternative and swipe it across the face. Alternatively, use your hands and pat gently into the skin until complete absorption.

description: Clean & Clear Blackhead Clearing Toner 200ml (6.7 fl oz) is a facial toner that targets blackheads by removing any impurities trapped inside the pores. Due to the Salicylic Acid present in its formula, it acts as a great exfoliator and it is gentle enough so that it can be used daily. As a result of removing dirt, dead skin cells and excess oil, not only does it cleanse the skin but it also prevents future blackheads from forming. This product penetrates easily and deeply into the pores so you can see results from day one. Therefore, you can expect a clear and smooth complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clean & Clear Blackhead Clearing Toner 200ml (6.7 fl oz) once or twice a day. Firstly, apply to a cotton pad and, then, wipe all over the face and neck, paying special attention to the T-zone and avoiding the eye area. Alternatively, use it after cleansing to tighten and tone pores. In the end, do not rinse.

description:
Sensilis Purify Balancing Toner 200ml (6.76fl oz) is a facial toner that doubles up as a purifying essence. Ideal for combination to oily skin types, this vegan toner helps to regulate excess sebum and perfectly finishes your cleansing routine. This product replaces the Sensilis Ritual Care Purifying Toner with a new formula and packaging.
Combining astringent ingredients such as hamamelis water and zinc, the formula offers a gentle purifying action that reduces the appearance of pores. At the same time, hyaluronic acid helps to hydrate, promoting soft and plump skin. Apply it as a toner and essence to refresh the skin. As a result, it helps reduce excess sebum production as well as to minimize the appearance of enlarged pores.
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with, thoroughly cleanse the skin and pat it dry. Then, apply a few drops of Sensilis Purify Balancing Toner 200ml (6.76fl oz) onto the hands and pat it gently onto the face and neck. Alternatively, you may apply it to a cotton round. Allow a few moments and then follow with your favorite serum and/or facial moisturizer.

description:
Clarins Hydrating Toning Lotion is particularly tailored for those with normal to dry skin types. This hydrating toner completes the cleansing process, consequently leaving the skin not just clean, but deeply hydrated and ready for subsequent skincare products. At the heart of the formula, the innovative [Microbiote Complex] combines saffron flower polyphenols and a marine prebiotic. This unique complex supports the preservation of the skin’s microbiome balance. Moreover, it features aloe vera and organic fig extract that hydrate and soften the skin, promoting a supple and smooth complexion. As a result, this lotion leaves the skin not only hydrated but also soft, fresh, and rebalanced.
This toner stands out not only for its moisturizing benefits but also for its lightweight, comforting texture that leaves the skin feeling soft and fresh. This aspect of the toner ensures that it fits seamlessly into any skincare routine, offering a pleasant and refreshing experience. In summary, this lotion specifically targets dehydration, leaving the skin hydrated. So, if you're looking to introduce a burst of hydration into your routine, this toner is a great addition especially for those with normal to dry skin. t's available in different formats, including an eco-refill.
how_to_use:
How to use
Soak a cotton pad or reusable alternative with Clarins Hydrating Toning Lotion and swipe across the face and neck.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Filler [HA] Replumping Toner provides an anti-aging action while moisturizing the skin, smoothing it and leaving a feeling of freshness. This toner leaves an immediate sensation of clean, fresh skin and without a tugging sensation. At the same time, it provides advanced anti-wrinkle efficacy helping to fill them, moisturizing the skin and visibly smoothing it. Thus, this luxurious toner penetrates the skin leaving a radiant finish.  
The formula of this face toner contains pure Hyaluronic Acid that intensely hydrate skin, smooth and replump wrinkles and the skin in general. In addition, this formula contains two types of Hyaluronic Acid. Macro muleculas provide a boost of hydration leaving the skin soft to the touch. Micro muleculas penetrate into the layers of the skin to help plump out wrinkles and lines of expession. With this, this toner can not only provide you a plumped and revitalized look but also helps to cleanse your skin leaving it fresh and hydrated. With daily use, your skin feels softer and is replumped with moisture. Wrinkles and expression lines appear reduced and contours look smoother and fuller. It is also suitable for all skin types looking for a rejuvenated and revitalized complexion.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Hyaluronic Acid, which is a natural part of the skin connective tissue and has the capacity to retain water. This ability to not only deeply moisturize the skin but also plump it up keeps the skin hydrated while helping reduce fine lines and wrinkles.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Filler [HA] Replumping Toner morning and evening with a cotton pad as part of your anti-aging cleansing routine. No need to rinse.

description:
Ziaja Manuka Tree Purifying Astringent Face Toner 200ml (7.0 fl oz) is a toner for normal, oily, and combination skin types. This product serves as a complementary step to the cleansing process, helping to remove any remaining dirt and makeup residues while restoring the skin's natural balance and freshness. Its vegan formula contains 98% ingredients of natural origin. It includes manuka leaf extract, with antibacterial properties, which helps combat acne blemishes and keep the skin clear. The formula also features astringent zinc gluconate, which aids in fighting acne lesions and reducing the appearance of enlarged pores. Additionally, mandelic acid and lactobionic acid provide gentle exfoliation, smoothing the skin and unclogging pores.
Last but not least, panthenol helps to calm irritated skin and provides essential moisture, so that the skin remains soft and comfortable. In essence, this product's combination of antibacterial, astringent, exfoliating, and soothing ingredients works together to improve the overall condition of the skin, for clean, fresh skin that feels balanced.
how_to_use:
How to use
Dispense an appropriate amount of Ziaja Manuka Tree Purifying Astringent Face Toner 200ml (7.0 fl oz) onto a cotton pad or reusable alternative. Then, gently wipe it across the skin of the face, avoiding the eye area. Do not rinse.

description:
Round Lab 1025 Dokdo Toner 100ml (3.38floz) is a gentle yet effective solution for daily skin refinement and hydration. This toner makes use of clean and mineral-rich deep-sea water sourced from Ulleung-do, in Korea. It also employs the patented technology Hatching EX-07, which gently but efficiently exfoliates dead skin cells. So, this gentle exfoliation helps remove daily impurities and smooth the skin’s surface, revealing a fresher and more refined texture. To further enhance the product's benefits, the formula contains a blend of moisturizing and soothing agents including panthenol, allantoin, and betaine, as well as extracts from red seaweed and sugarcane. This combination not only boosts the skin’s moisture levels but also provides relief to tired and irritated skin, making it feel calm and comfortable.
Suitable for all skin types, including those with sensitive skin, this toner is designed for daily use. Moreover, its lightweight texture absorbs quickly, leaving no sticky residue behind. In essence, with regular use, this toner helps to maintain a balanced, hydrated, and smooth complexion, making it a perfect staple in your daily skincare regimen.
how_to_use:
How to use
Dispense an appropriate amount of Round Lab 1025 Dokdo Toner 100ml (3.38floz) onto a cotton pad or reusable alternative. Then, gently wipe it across clean skin of the face. Alternatively, soak cotton pads with the toner and apply them on top of the skin. Then, leave them on for 5 to 10 minutes.

description:
Clarins Soothing Toning Lotion is particularly tailored for those with very dry or sensitive skin. This soothing toner completes the cleansing process, consequently leaving the skin soothed, comfortable, and ready for subsequent skincare products. At the heart of the formula, the innovative [Microbiote Complex] combines saffron flower polyphenols and a marine prebiotic. This unique complex supports the preservation of the skin’s microbiome balance. Moreover, it features organic chamomile extract, specifically chosen for its calming and soothing properties. Therefore, this toner stands out for its ability to rebalance and soothe the skin. The skin is left feeling beautifully soft, fresh, and rehydrated.
This toner stands out not only for its soothing benefits but also for its lightweight yet comforting gel-like texture that leaves the skin feeling soft and fresh. This aspect of the toner ensures that it fits seamlessly into any skincare routine, offering a pleasant and soothing experience. In summary, this lotion offers more than just toning. It's a multi-benefit solution that soothes, softens, refreshes, and rebalances the skin. As such, it is a great addition to the skincare routine, particularly for those seeking to alleviate discomfort associated with dryness or sensitivity. It's available in different formats, including an eco-refill.
how_to_use:
How to use
Soak a cotton pad or reusable alternative with Clarins Soothing Toning Lotion and swipe across the face and neck.

description:
coxir Black Snail Collagen Toner 150ml (5.07floz) is a facial toner designed to enhance skin elasticity, deeply hydrate, and promote a youthful complexion. Infused with ingredients such as snail mucin, collagen, and black rice extract, this toner helps rejuvenate skin by providing intense moisture, diminishing the appearance of wrinkles, and improving skin texture and luminosity. So, snail mucin is renowned for its regenerative properties, offering benefits that include enhanced skin repair, improved skin texture, and reduced signs of aging. This natural ingredient is also packed with nutrients that help maintain hydration and leave the skin looking smooth and radiant.
Then, collagen helps hydrate and plump the skin, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Black rice enhances the formula with its anti-aging benefits, further aiding in achieving a smoother and more even complexion. Perfect for use after cleansing, this toner prepares the skin for the following steps of the routine while leaving it protected, hydrated, and smoother.
how_to_use:
How to use
Dispense an appropriate amount of coxir Black Snail Collagen Toner 150ml (5.07floz) onto the palms or a cotton pad. Then, apply it to clean skin of the face and neck. Finally, gently pat until the product fully absorbs.

description: Martiderm Blooming Toner is a soothing and revitalizing toner for normal to dry skin. With a comforting texture, this is the ideal toner for those who suffer from dryness and sensitivity. Contrary to most toners for dry skin, which usually just nourish, this toner contains a blend of active ingredients that improve the complexion. Vitamin C, together with niacinamide, calendula, proteoglycans and prebiotics balance the skin in order to improve the comfort levels and to deeply hydrate the skin and revitalize it. On one hand, the fluid but nourishing texture glides onto the skin to protect and soothe. On the other hand, active ingredients help to ensure that the skin is ready to absorb all the ingredients from your favorites serums and moisturizers. This toner, therefore, achieves the perfect balance between a nourished skin and a toner that improves the skin quality. A clinical study has proved that within 24h, the skin is 23% more nourished and within one month the skin has improved radiance and hydration levels.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, soak a cotton pad with Martiderm Blooming Toner and then swipe it all over your cleansed face, neck and décolleté. Don't rinse and follow with your favorites serums and moisturizers.

description:
PURITO AHA BHA Refreshing Solution 100ml (3.38 fl oz) is a leave-on exfoliating solution designed to refine skin texture and unclog pores, therefore preventing blemishes. This formula combines the benefits of alpha hydroxy acids (AHAs) and beta hydroxy acids (BHAs) to offer a dual-action approach to exfoliation. With 7% glycolic acid, an AHA known for its ability to gently exfoliate the skin's surface and remove dead skin cells, this solution promotes a smoother and more radiant complexion. In addition to glycolic acid, the solution contains 2% salicylic acid, a BHA that has the ability to penetrate the pores. So, salicylic acid excels at removing dead skin cells from within the pores, effectively unclogging them and preventing the formation of blemishes such as blackheads and whiteheads. 
To balance the exfoliating properties, this product is infused with Willow Bark Water, a natural ingredient that delivers soothing effects. In essence, regular application of this solution results in noticeably smoother skin with a healthy glow. Its ability to unclog pores and prevent blemishes helps maintain a purified and more luminous complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of PURITO AHA BHA Refreshing Solution 100ml (3.38 fl oz) onto a cotton pad or reusable alternative and swipe it across the skin of the face, avoiding the eye area. Do not rinse. Apply sunscreen in the morning routine. Note that a light tingling sensation and redness may occur after application of this product. It is recommended to introduce this product gradually into your routine if your skin is not used to exfoliating acids (for example, start by using it once a week and gradually increase the frequency).

description: B-Lift Age Supreme Active Tonifying Water 200ml (6.76 fl oz) is designed to tone, refresh and brighten the skin, after cleansing. This delicate and light thermal water contains rich ingredients such as hyaluronic acid and active rosebud water. Consequently, its formula provides luminosity, softness and elasticity to the skin. In addition to being suitable for all skin types, this toning water is ideal for preparing the skin before applying face cream.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply B-Lift Age Supreme Active Tonifying Water 200ml (6.76 fl oz) in the morning and the evening on the face and neck, after cleansing your skin. However, when applying, you should avoid contact with the eyes. In the end, there is no need to rinse. Afterwards, proceed with your skincare routine as usual.
This product must be kept out of the sight and reach of children.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Laser Peeling Toner 180ml (6.09fl oz) consists of a tonic with an intense smoothing and brightening action for all skin types. More specifically, this product has an exfoliating ability that removes dead skin cells on the face to increase cell turnover. In turn, this leads to a much more even complexion in terms of texture and appearance. That is, dark spots are reduced in the long term while the skin is left without any grain in texture. Finally, with this toner, the skin is also much smoother and with a radiant and glowing complexion.
For this toner to have an exfoliating function, it is enriched with 5% pure Glycolic Acid. This main ingredient lifts and eliminates dead cells from the skin leaving it cleaner and fresher. In turn, it promotes cell renewal, revealing brighter and smoother skin. In addition to all this, through cell renewal, dark spots on the face are eventually also reduced. To counterbalance this ingredient, this tonic also contains Aloe Vera and Allantoin. These help to soothe the skin and prevent any irritation and future discomforts such as redness, tightness, or even dryness. Moreover, the skin also ends up being more hydrated in the long term. All in all, this toner designed for daily use leaves skin feeling smoother, refreshed, and with a healthy glow that will last for a long time.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Laser Peeling Toner 180ml (6.09fl oz) at night to a clean, dry face with your fingers or with the help of a cotton pad. Sweep across the face while avoiding the eye area. At the end, gently tap in excess with fingers. Make sure the next day you use a sun protection cream to prevent skin irritation.

description:
Clarins Purifying Toning Lotion is particularly tailored for those with combination to oily skin types. This refreshing toner perfects the cleansing process, consequently leaving the skin purified, balanced, and ready for subsequent skincare products. At the heart of the formula, the innovative [Microbiote Complex] combines saffron flower polyphenols and a marine prebiotic. This unique complex supports the preservation of the skin’s microbiome balance. Moreover, it features meadowsweet extract to help regulate excess sebum while witch hazel extract, known for its astringent properties, helps minimize the appearance of pores and refine skin texture. As a result, this lotion leaves the skin feeling purified, refreshed, and more balanced. With each application, pores become less visible, and the skin looks soft and fresh.
This toner stands out not only for its skin-balancing benefits but also for its lightweight, comforting texture that leaves the skin feeling fresh. This aspect of the toner ensures that it fits seamlessly into any skincare routine, offering a pleasant and refreshing experience. In summary, this lotion targets skin concerns of those with combination to oily skin, being a great addition to their skincare routine. It's available in different formats, including an eco-refill.
how_to_use:
How to use
Soak a cotton pad or reusable alternative with Clarins Purifying Toning Lotion and swipe across the face and neck.

description:
SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Hyalu-Cica Brightening Toner is designed to hydrate and gently exfoliate the skin right after cleansing. Ideal for those seeking a smoother and more radiant complexion, this toner is suitable for sensitive skin. So, thanks to citric acid, an AHA, and capryloyl salicylic acid, a LHA, this toner works diligently to sweep away dead skin cells. The result? A more refined skin texture that not only feels incredibly soft but also showcases a natural, revived glow. However, it's not just about exfoliation. With 74% Madagascan Centella asiatica leaf water, this toner offers a calming touch. Therefore, if your skin is prone to irritations or if it just needs a little soothing, this ingredient steps in to provide relief, ensuring a comfortable skin experience with every application. 
Additionally, this toner boasts hydrating ingredients, such as ceramide biom. This consists of ceramide nanoparticles that help replenish lost moisture and strengthen the skin's natural barrier. So, with consistent use, you'll find your skin feeling more resilient, hydrated, and overall healthier. In terms of application, the light texture absorbs rapidly, allowing you to move on to the next step in your skincare routine without any delay. All in all, this toner hydrates, exfoliates, and soothes all at once. It's a simple yet effective addition to any skincare regimen, promising healthier-looking and more radiant skin with every use.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Hyalu-Cica Brightening Toner to a cotton pad or directly to the palms. Then, apply it to clean, dry skin.

description:
Darphin Intral Daily Micellar Toner is a refreshing toner that gently removes any remaining impurities and makeup from your skin. This is an essential final step to add to your cleansing routine especially if you struggle with sensitive and easily irritated skin. In fact, this tone is part of the Intral range, a set of products specially developed to soothe, calm, and comfort your skin. Even more, 92% of this product’s ingredients are from a natural origin.
Infused with the botanical Calm Complex coupled with Centaurium, this formula is suitable for sensitive skin visibly reducing and preventing irritation. On the other hand, this toner contains Hyaluronic Acid of two molecular weights to deliver hydration to the skin. Lastly, Micelle Technology is responsible for removing makeup, oil, and other impurities. As a result, this toner not only completes the cleansing ritual but also moisturizes the skin, leaving it fresh, toned, and radiant.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Darphin Intral Daily Micellar Toner to your morning and evening skincare routine, using it on your face and neck. You may apply it by soaking a cotton pad with the product and then swiping it across your skin. Alternatively, you can put a few drops into your palms and then press them into your face.

description:
Pestle & Mortar NMF Lactic Acid Toner is the hero toner for those suffering from skin sensitivity who also want a peeling toner. Having sensitive skin is often likely to be incompatible with an exfoliating toner. However, if you choose the right ingredients, it's not that hard to achieve your skin goal of perfectly smooth skin. With lactic acid and gluconolactate, both known for their compatibility with sensitive skin, the outer layer of dead skin cells is gently removed, while at the same time the hydrolipidic mantle that protects the skin is reinforced. Additionally, this formula also contains natural moisturizing factors that give the product its name and improve the hydration levels. Indian gooseberry extract, together with black tea extract, help to fade hyperpigmentation and boost the radiance of the skin.
Another key point of this star product is that it's formulated without any fragrance or alcohol, which translates into a perfectly curated formula for all skin types, even those with sensitivity and redness. This toner harnesses the best ingredients for sensitive skin and combines them with ones that naturally occur on the skin, in order to achieve maximum compatibility while delivering hydration, radiance and even texture.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Pestle & Mortar NMF Lactic Acid Toner onto a cotton pad and gently sweep it over previously cleansed skin, avoiding the eye contour. You can use this toner both in the morning and evening.

Clarins My Clarins Pure-Reset Purifying Matifying Toner 200ml (6.7floz) is designed to rebalance and refine the complexion with its lightweight, ultra-fresh texture. Preparing the skin for further care, this toner visibly reduces shine and purifies the complexion. To begin with, at the heart of the formula is the innovative Healthy Plant Complex, which includes coconut water and alpenrose extract. This unique blend offers nutrition and antioxidant benefits thus promoting a healthy-looking complexion. Moreover, the formula contains tamarind pulp acids which help refine skin texture, and meadowsweet which helps reduce excess shine. All in all, this toner not only purifies and rebalances the skin but also provides a mattifying effect, refining the skin's texture for a smoother, more refined appearance.
Its results are recognized by users, with 97% of women reporting that the lotion helps purify the skin from the first application and 87% stating it effectively mattifies the skin. As a last note, this toner contains 98% ingredients of natural origin and a vegan formula. In conclusion, it purifies, rebalances, and mattifies the skin while refining its texture.
how_to_use:
How to use
Soak a cotton pad or reusable alternative with Clarins My Clarins Pure-Reset Purifying Matifying Toner 200ml (6.7floz) and swipe it across the face and neck.

description:
Ziaja Cucumber Face Toner 200ml (7.0 fl oz) is a toner designed for normal to oily skin types. It boasts a vegan formula that contains 90% of ingredients of natural origin, including hydrating and soothing cucumber and panthenol. So, this toner delicately finishes the cleansing process, ensuring that the skin is properly prepped for the next steps in the skincare routine. Its moisturizing and refreshing effects help to keep the skin hydrated and revitalized, making it feel fresh and clean. It also helps reduce the appearance of dilated pores and has soothing properties that help to calm the skin, providing an immediate sense of comfort.
Applying this toner is simple and effective. After cleansing, dispense it onto a cotton pad and gently wipe it over the face and neck. This will help remove any remaining impurities and prepare the skin for the application of further cosmetics, such as serums and moisturizers. Moreover, its refreshing properties make it a delightful part of the skincare routine. All in all, this is a hydrating, refreshing, and soothing toner that also helps reduce the appearance of enlarged pores.
how_to_use:
How to use
Dispense an appropriate amount of Ziaja Cucumber Face Toner 200ml (7.0 fl oz) onto a cotton pad or reusable alternative. Then, gently wipe it across clean skin of the face and neck. Do not rinse.

description: Mádara Balancing Toner 200ml (6.8 fl oz) is a daily toner that helps with various skin issues like dull and unbalanced skin, giving it a vibrant and fresher look. Enriched with both Chamomile Flower Extract and Witch Hazel Leaf Water this product provides antioxidant and soothing properties. Cucumber Fruit Extract further adds to the soothing and emollient qualities of the toner. Besides, the formula also incorporates Lactic Acid to make your skin smoother by removing dead skin cells and allowing for deeper penetration of other active ingredients. Sodium PCA acts as a powerful humectant, that helps keep the skin hydrated. On the other hand, Xylitylglucoside helps increase natural moisturizing factors (NMFs) and improves the skin barrier. This amazing combination of actives provides a formula that not only helps regulate the microbiome, hydrate, and improve the skin barrier but also minimizes pores and gives the skin a fresh and vibrant look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mádara Balancing Toner 200ml (6.8 fl oz) onto clean skin in the morning and/or evening. Apply to a cotton pad and wipe it over the face, or you can apply it directly to the face with your hands. This product does not need to be rinsed. Be sure to follow it with your favorite serum or moisturizer.

description:
It'S Skin Power 10 Formula Powerful Genius Serum in Toner 255ml is a multipurpose composition that efficiently tones the skin while delivering optimal hydration. By introducing this product into your daily routine, you will enjoy supple skin, and refined texture, among many other benefits. On one side, the presence of Polyhydroxy Acid provides an efficient exfoliating action without irritating the complexion. In fact, with a larger molecular structure, this ingredient is able to remove dead skin cells and impurities whilst preventing reactivity. 

At the same time, the Powerful Genius Serum in Toner also resorts to BIOMEGENIUS 5, a complex that contains five active ingredients, including patented Lactobacillus, to simultaneously target multiple skin concerns. As it happens, this toner is part of the Power 10 Formula Powerful Genius collection – a line of products that improves the overall condition of your skin. According to the brand, this range is able to increase radiance, moisture, firmness and strength in just 10 days or regular application.
how_to_use:
How to use 
First, pour It'S Skin Power 10 Formula Powerful Genius Serum in Toner 255ml into a cotton pad. Then, glide it gently on the dry and clean skin of your face. Complement with other products from the same range in order to obtain maximum results.

description: Caudalie Grape Water is a 100% natural and organic extract directly from the French vineyards. This soothing spray is one of Caudalie's bestsellers for good reasons. For one thing, it helps to improve the hydration levels of the skin by 127%, which ensures that it's the perfect product to use throughout the day and keep on your bag or desk at all times. Moreover, the skin sensitivity levels are decreased by 61%, ensuring it's suitable even for the most sensitive skins. Extracted from the grapes in Bordeaux, it goes through a low-pressure distillation process to ensure the water keeps all the grapes' properties.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

100% Organic grape water has hydrating and soothing actions, therefore increasing the moisture levels on the skin and reducing sensitivity.
how_to_use:
How to use
Vaporize Caudalie Grape Water onto the face as needed. In order to increase its refreshing effect, keep the bottle in the fridge due to the soothing action of the cold.

description: Embryolisse Eau de Beauté Rosamelis consists of a refreshing mist capable of purifying, smoothing and toning the skin on your face. Dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested, it is suitable for all types of skin, including the most sensitive. Furthermore, its composition is enriched with natural plant extracts such as rose, orange blossom, cornflower and hamamelis flower. This way, the skin gains a boost of hydration, is refreshed and with a delicious fresh fragrance. Finally, this mist leaves your complexion sublime and soothed, thus helping to reduce discomfort from dry or irritated skin. Additionally, this mist can work as a toner for the skin, so it is applied with the help of a cotton pad in order for you to clean your skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Embryolisse Eau de Beauté Rosamelis in the morning and evening with a cotton pad to thoroughly cleanse the face and neck or as a refreshing mist by spraying onto the face. Can also be used as a makeup fixing mist.

description:
Mádara Comforting Toner is the perfect addition to your skincare routine if you have dry skin and also struggle with dryness-induced discomfort and tightness. In fact, this nourishing formula will instantaneously calm your sensitive skin. Infused with soothing floral extracts such as Chamomile and Rose, this toner regulates pH balance, soothing and preventing any irritation. As the product's name itself suggests, your skin will be comforted and smoothed from the moment you apply this fantastic product. 
Furthermore, this Mádara Toner is also infused with moisturizing ingredients that deeply hydrate and tone the skin. It is a must-add step to your daily routine, right before applying your favorite moisturizer. 
The Mádara Comforting Toner also follows the brand’s ethical and sustainable concerns. In fact, this is a vegan and cruelty-free formula that comes in a 100% post-consumer recycled bottle. 
You can apply this product in the morning or at night-time, with the help of a cotton pad or by just applying some drops of the product in your hands and gently tapping the face.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Apply Mádara Comforting Toner to clean skin with cotton pad or by delicately splashing it with your hands. Then, follow up with your favourite moisturizer.

description:
Round Lab Soybean Nourishing Toner 300ml (10.1floz) is a skincare solution that delivers long-lasting moisture and anti-aging benefits. A great option for dry to combination skin, this nourishing toner features black soybean extract as its key ingredient. This ingredient is rich in antioxidants, which play a role in shielding the skin from environmental stressors. These antioxidants also help soothe the skin and minimize the appearance of fine lines, making this toner an excellent choice for those looking to enhance their skin's appearance and overall health. Additionally, the formula is enriched with adenosine, cocoa seed extract, ceramides, red seaweed extract, and sugarcane extract. So, this combination of ingredients provides additional anti-wrinkle benefits, fortifies the skin’s barrier, and helps the skin remain hydrated and plump. 
Lastly, the formula's low pH is designed to match the natural acidity of the skin, promoting a balanced, healthy skin environment. In summary, this toner offers a practical solution to maintain skin hydration and combat aging signs, ensuring the skin remains youthful and radiant.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Round Lab Soybean Nourishing Toner 300ml (10.1floz) onto clean skin of the face. Then, gently tap the skin to promote absorption.

description:
Round Lab Mugwort Calming Toner 300ml (10.1floz) is a hydrating and soothing toner that helps calm irritated skin. Crafted with the power of mugwort, this toner provides a refreshing experience that soothes and restores irritated skin. Sourced from Geomun-do Island, where the plant is nurtured by fresh sea breezes, this key ingredient is ideal for reducing redness and calming skin discomfort. Additionally, madecassoside further delivers skin-calming effects. The formula is also enriched with a blend of ingredients such as red seaweed, sugarcane, cocoa seed extracts, and betaine, which collectively enhance the toner's soothing effects. So, these ingredients bring additional hydrating and antioxidant benefits, helping to maintain a healthy, resilient complexion.
Lastly, this lightweight toner allows for effortless application and is ideal for layering. Its non-sticky texture allows it to be absorbed quickly, leaving the skin feeling refreshed and comfortable without any residue. So, whether you're dealing with stressed skin or simply seeking a toner that offers soothing hydration, this toner is a good option to add to your daily skincare routine.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Round Lab Mugwort Calming Toner 300ml (10.1floz) onto the skin of the face, after cleansing. Then, gently tap the skin to promote absorption.

description: NUXE Very Rose Refreshing Toning Mist is a gentle toner, suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Removing cleanser residues and preparing the skin for the application of the next skincare product it is perfect to complete your cleansing routine. In the form of a mist, it is a quick and easy product to apply that will refresh, soothe, and comfort your skin due to its unique formula. Containing 95% natural origin ingredients it helps retain water in the skin and offers both soothing and softening properties. Preventing dryness and strengthening the skin barrier this toning mist helps preserve the natural balance of the skin. In addition, along with these benefits, it is able to provide you a wonderful sensorial experience with its subtle, fresh, and delicate rose scent.
how_to_use:
How to use
While keeping your eyes closed, spray NUXE Very Rose Refreshing Toning Mist over the face from a distance of 15cm. Leave it to dry or remove the excess with a tissue.

description: COSRX BHA Blackhead Power Liquid has a simple yet deeply effective formula designed to detoxify oily or acne-prone skin types. In fact, thanks to a liquid texture, it enters your skin ready to regenerate the natural moisture barrier, unclogging as well as refining pores. With each application, a gentle chemical exfoliation takes place, ridding your complexion of acne, blemishes, or other types of daily impurities. To the same extent, this nutritive cleansing option helps regulate excess sebum production, balancing as well as soothing for a long period of time. In the end, you'll notice an extra luminous finish, as dead skin cells and blackheads are cast aside. Made of Beta Hydroxy Acid and reinforced with Willow Bark Water, it prevents irritation/redness, being a powerful ally for the most sensitive skin types. Fortified, moisturized, and shield from harmful external factors, the epidermis regains its health in a heartbeat.
how_to_use:
How to use
COSRX BHA Blackhead Power Liquid can be used as an essence or a toner and should be applied after cleansing the skin. You should apply a small portion into a cotton pad or a reusable towel. Then, delicately sweep it all over your face, staying away from the sensitive eye and mouth sections. If used as a toner you should make sure the liquid is fully absorbed before applying the next skincare products.

description:
Benton Deep Green Tea Toner helps to rejuvenate and soften one's complexion by relying on over 50% Green Tea Leaf Water. Originally from Korea, this ingredient relieves redness and irritation, putting a stop to imbalances in skin tone/texture.  Moreover, this toner works best when used right after cleansing your face as it helps to preserve optimal moisture levels. Among other skin-loving components, this option includes Centella Asiatica, Houttuynia Cordata, and Willow Bark Extracts. 
To the same extent, Hyaluronic Acid acts like a sponge that attracts a vast quantity of water in the air. In turn, truly hydrated as well as nourished, your complexion is able to thrive and live up to its full potential. Meanwhile, the liquid formula penetrates easily into damaged skin tissues allowing them to recover so they can receive the benefits of other products. Thus, after each application, you're free to use your makeup essentials, finishing off your beauty routine. Finally, free of artificial fragrances and pigments, this toner suits and balances the pH levels of all skin types for the ultimate polished outcome.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous amount of Benton Deep Green Tea Toner over the face and pat gently to facilitate the absorption of beneficial ingredients. For optimal results, use in conjunction with Benton Deep Green Tea Serum as well as Benton Deep Green Tea Lotion. Finally, you can also complete this soothing treatment by resorting to Benton Deep Green Tea Cleansing Foam. Apply the different products with your hands or using a cotton pad/reusable towel.

Mádara Clarifying Toner  is a purifying product specially developed for oily skin and to target conditions associated with this type of complexion. On one side, we are talking about a formula that balances the skin’s pH and controls the oil levels thanks to ingredients like Oak Bark and Sweet Flag. This toner also has a deeply exfoliating performance, unclogging pores and mattifying the skin. Therefore, the Clarifying Toner does not only effectively prevent blemishes but also keeps the skin looking and feeling fresh. In addition to that, it has a pore-minimizer effect and prepares your skin to be moisturized. With regular use, your skin will look more radiant, uniform, and healthy.

How to use 
Apply Mádara Clarifying Toner  to clean skin with cotton pad or by delicately splashing it with your hands. Then, follow up with your favourite moisturizer.

description: Evolve Liquid Radiance Glycolic Toner 100ml (3.38fl oz) is natural exfoliating treatment suitable for all skin types, even the most sensitive. For skin that looks dull, uneven, and lacking in natural luminosity, this exfoliating toner combines 100% natural origin AHAs (alpha hydroxy acids) and BHAs (beta hydroxy acids) in order to boost cellular turnover and reveal a glowing, naturally beautiful complexion. Glycolic, Malic, and Salicylic Acids gently exfoliate and refine the surface of the skin, making it brighter and even.  On the other hand, Galactoarabinan works to prevent loss of water which helps minimize dryness, sensitivity, and irritation. The skin is renewed with minimum irritation, emerging with a newfound glow that radiates health and beauty.
how_to_use:
How to use
In the evening, apply Evolve Liquid Radiance Glycolic Toner 100ml (3.38fl oz) to the previously cleansed skin of the face and neck. Use gentle sweeping motions in order to cover all the desired areas. Do not rinse. Since this product is a chemical exfoliator, you should always apply sunscreen in the morning after using it.
Because this product contains willow bark extract, it is not recommended for use during pregnancy.

Frezyderm Ac-Norm Normalizing Lotion 200ml (6.76floz) is specifically suitable for oily and acne-prone skin. This product stands out for its unique blend of active ingredients aimed at addressing various concerns associated with acne-prone skin. One of the key ingredients is Oleanolic acid-NDGA, known for its sebum-regulation and anti-microbial properties. This component plays a crucial role in balancing oil production and combating acne-causing bacteria. Additionally, Fomes officinalis in the formula adds pore-tightening and astringent effects. This ingredient aids in minimizing the appearance of enlarged pores, a common concern for those with oily skin. The formula also includes Deepsan, an innovative component that helps reduce skin discomfort and irritation.
Another key point of this lotion is its versatility as it can be used on both the face and body. It is especially effective in treating back acne. In summary, this lotion is a great choice for complementing the cleansing step in oily and acne-prone skin. Its formula combines sebum-regulating, antimicrobial, pore-tightening, and soothing ingredients to address the multiple facets of acne-prone skin. All in all, it provides a cleaner and more refined skin texture while contributing to a comfortable skin feel.

How to use
Soak a cotton pad or reusable alternative with Frezyderm Ac-Norm Normalizing Lotion 200ml (6.76floz) and swipe over clean, dry skin. Suitable for acne on the back.

description:
RVB LAB Microbioma Balancing Hydra-Toner 200ml (6.8 fl oz) is a toner that helps maintain a healthy skin barrier and microbiota. The ReviBiome System, integral to this toner, includes prebiotics and probiotics that balance the skin’s microbiota and strengthen its barrier function. So, this helps prevent irritation, dehydration, and also premature aging, ensuring the skin stays healthy and resilient. The toner also features microspheres of hyaluronic acid that gently melt into the skin, releasing a boost of hydration. This provides the skin with a feeling of softness and freshness. Additionally, this toner is enriched with trehalose, a sugar that not only hydrates the skin but also protects its cells from external aggressors and oxidative stress.
This toner is especially suitable for sensitive and sensitized skin or for anyone looking to maintain a healthy complexion. So, by incorporating this toner into your daily routine, you can enjoy the benefits of a well-balanced microbiota and a stronger skin barrier, leading to healthier, more radiant skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Dispense an appropriate amount of RVB LAB Microbioma Balancing Hydra-Toner 200ml (6.8 fl oz) onto a cotton pad. Then, gently wipe it across the skin in circular motions in order to release the hyaluronic acid from the spheres.

description:
Babé Depigment+ Lotion Glow 150ml (5.07 fl oz) illuminates, renews, and evens out the skin tone. For that purpose, the formula blends ingredients with depigmenting action, namely vitamin C, and niacinamide, alongside an exfoliating acid. On one hand, vitamin C contributes to increasing luminosity and evenness of skin tone. Then, niacinamide plays a dual role. It not only helps in unifying the skin tone but also strengthens the skin's barrier function. Accompanying this is gluconolactone, a gentle exfoliating acid that aids in the softening and smoothing of the skin surface. Additionally, pantenol and hyaluronic acid both work to provide hydration. Last but not least, a pre-postbiotic supports a healthy microbiome. As such, this product helps reduce the appearance of dark spots.
The innovative texture of this product offers a refreshing experience and is suitable for daily use, both morning and night, as a step following facial cleansing. In summary, this lotion aims to brighten, renew, and even out the skin tone.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Babé Depigment+ Lotion Glow 150ml (5.07 fl oz) to clean, dry skin. Pat gently to absorb.

description: One Thing Hyaluronic Acid Complex Toner 150ml (5.0 fl oz) is a focused skincare solution, specially formulated for those who prefer a minimalist approach to their skincare routine. In particular, this toner features hyaluronic acid, a renowned ingredient for its moisturizing properties. This toner utilizes hyaluronic acid's ability to provide deep hydration, effectively plumping fine lines and making them less noticeable. In particular, it combines the effectiveness of low molecular and high molecular hyaluronic acid. High molecular weight hyaluronic acid forms a film on the skin's surface that prevents water evaporation while low molecular hyaluronic acid delivers deep hydration. As such, this toner focuses on delivering intense hydration and addressing fine lines that are often highlighted by dehydrated skin. The result is soft, smooth and elastic skin!
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Hyaluronic acid, in both low and high molecular weights, actively boosts skin hydration. On one hand, 9,500ppm low molecular weight hyaluronic acid acts deeply in the skin to capture and retain moisture. The 9,500ppm low molecular weight hyaluronic acid penetrates deep into the skin to capture and retain moisture. Meanwhile, the 500ppm high molecular weight hyaluronic acid forms a protective, hydrating film on the surface to prevent dehydration. Consequently, this dual action leaves the skin hydrated and plumped.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply One Thing Hyaluronic Acid Complex Toner 150ml (5.0 fl oz) to clean, dry skin after cleansing, with a cotton pad or reusable alternative. Alternatively, mix 5-10% with your skincare products on the palm of your hand (for example: 5 to 10 ml of this product with 100 ml cream). You can also soak a cotton/reusable pad with the product and apply it to the affected areas for 10 minutes. You can also transfer a portion of the toner to a small spray bottle to create your mist and spritz it whenever necessary.

description:
SKINFOOD Pantothenic Water Parsley Toner is a toner that helps to decrease excess sebum while also soothing and hydrating the skin. It is especially suited for acne-prone skin, due to being able to calm inflammation, which is common with breakouts. So, this toner contains Hanjae water parsley extract, which is processed by a special method that helps to extract larger amounts of beneficial compounds. Water parsley contains pantothenic acid, which helps to hydrate the skin and to keep a healthy skin barrier. It also helps to decrease excess sebum and soothe the skin. Additionally, this product contains a complex of sage, chamomile and Centella asiatica, as well as dipotassium glycyrrhizate, further helping to soothe inflamed skin. Even more, this toner contains salicylic acid, an ingredient known for acting on pores to clear up excess oil and skin cells, targeting blemishes.
One study found that, after 4 weeks of using this product, the amount of sebum on the face decreased by 25%. All in all, this toner helps to regulate excess oil while hydrating and calming inflamed skin, making it ideal for oily to combination skin, especially acne-prone skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Soak a cotton pad with SKINFOOD Pantothenic Water Parsley Toner and apply onto previously cleansed skin of the face. Alternatively, apply the product to the fingers and then massage the face. Do not rinse.

description:

description:
mccosmetics Facial Toner 500ml has an extremely gentle formula perfectly suited for all skin types, even the most sensitive ones. Namely, this toner is ideal to complete your facial daily cleansing as it tones, soothes, and hydrates the skin, minimizing pore size. On the other hand, with antioxidant and renewal properties, its composition removes any remaining traces of makeup, skin impurities, and excess oil. In the end, the skin is refreshed and toned with a more refined texture. Additionally, this facial tonic has a rose fresh fragrance perfect for summer. This is because with this formula you can perfectly refresh the skin throughout the day while hydrating, calming, and balancing its pH.
One of the main ingredients of this toner is Aloe Vera. It has several properties, namely hydrating, anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, regenerating, soothing, and anti-itching, hence making this toner perfect for sensitized skin. On the other hand, Rosa Gallica Extract has gentle antiseptic and astringent properties that can help cleanse the skin, preventing blemishes. In addition, it deeply soothes the skin thanks to its anti-inflammatory properties. Finally, Chamomile Flower Extract also has soothing and calming properties while Orange Flower Extract reduces blood pressure and regenerates the skin.
All in all, this toner becomes a true ally for any occasion and for any skin type. Namely, it moisturizes, regenerates, and even soothes it while balancing its pH. On the other hand, it reduces irritation, cleanses the skin, and removes the last traces of oil and make-up after cleansing the face.
how_to_use:
How to use
Damp a cotton pad with mccosmetics Facial Toner 500ml and apply it to the face and neck with slide gentle movements. It is recommended to use after the cleansing milk. During summer, it can be a great option to fresh the skin, give it quick hydration, and balance pH.

description:
Missha Super Aqua Ultra Hyalron Toner Pads x90 consists of a set of individual pads soaked in a liquid toner perfect for dehydrated, sensitive and/or irritated skin. That said, these pads provide a powerful boost of hydration to the face while soothing the skin leaving it feeling more comforted. In addition, they allow for soft exfoliation and provide fast effects thanks to a formula that is free from 20 irritating chemicals. Furthermore, these pads gain a special relevance as they can be used on many occasions. In this sense, you can use them as a regular toner, as a moisturizing mask or a soothing mask, and as a refreshing makeup primer.
This composition contains 10 Hyaluronic Acid Complex Aquaporin which, in essence, consists of 10 different molecular weights of hyaluronic acid. This complex penetrates deep into the most diverse layers of the epidermis, exerting an intense moisturizing action on them. On the other hand, it leaves the skin visibly less dry, irritated, and even less sensitized. Furthermore, Allantoin helps to regenerate, soften and soothe also particularly sensitive skin while Caffeine minimizes fatigue signs and awakens skin cells. Finally, Ceramide NP holds skin tissues together and forms a protective layer to prevent moisture loss. In this case, all these actions end up having lasting effects on the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
You can use Missha Super Aqua Ultra Hyalron Toner Pads x90 in four different ways. First, use them as toner pads. To do this, wipe your face gently without exerting too much force. Then use it as a hydrating mask by leaving the pads on your face for 10 minutes. In the end, remove and massage the remaining product. Moreover, use them as a calming mask when your skin is more irritated. For this, place them on irritated or dry areas and let them act for 10 minutes as well. Finally, you can use it before applying makeup. To do this, cool them in the fridge a few minutes before, then apply them on the face, let them act for a few minutes to reduce the swelling, and finally, apply your makeup.

description:
COSRX Calming Liquid Intensive targets acne as well as other blemishes to detoxify and repair congested skin completely. In fact, the formula acts quickly and relies on a blend of healing ingredients to invigorate/refresh the epidermis, clearing it of imperfections dramatically. Formulated with alcohol derived from plants, this liquid also comes together thanks to the soothing COSRX Centella AC-Rx Complex. Thus, it awakens damaged skin cells at the same it focuses on reducing irritation or redness.
Moreover, its cooling facet is even more effective due to the successful combination of Asiaticoside, Madecassic Acid, and Asiatic Acid. Meanwhile, this improved version tends to diminish the risk of infection, alleviating cystic acne with the help of Zinc PCA. All in all, this skincare solution not only casts away excess oil but also clarifies one's complexions, leading it to a healthier path. Finally, the inclusion of over 60% of Propolis Extract moisturizes deeply for the best skin-softening finish!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous amount of COSRX Calming Liquid Intensive into a cotton pad or reusable alternative. Then, sweep the pad all over your face, as delicately as possible, and avoiding the sensitive eye area. Then, pat the remnants of the liquid into the skin to facilitate its full absorption. Remember to store the product away from direct sunlight so that the formula does not turn brown over time. Finally, explore the rest of COSRX's Calming range of skincare products to see if these also appeal to you.

description: Weleda Refining Toner is refreshes, clarifies, and perfects the skin, all at the same time. Maybe you're trying to sweep away leftover impurities that may have escaped your cleansing product, or maybe you're looking to refine the appearance of blemishes and enlarged pores. Either way, this toner can help. The all-natural formula pairs the refining properties of witch hazel with the toning benefits of wild rose leaf extract; the result is a uniquely revitalizing and reinvigorating blend. A light citrus fragrance contributes to this harmonious combination, creating a exhilarating experience that suits both your morning and evening rituals. Dermatologically tested and suitable for all skin types, even the most sensitive, this toner is the perfect complement to any skincare routine. Moreover, it prepares the skin to receive the rest of your skincare routine--including, of course, your favorite Weleda moisturizer.

How to use
Apply Weleda Refining Toner in the morning as well as the evening, after cleansing. Using a cotton pad, distribute the product on the face, neck and décolletage using gentle sweeping motions. Always take care to avoid the eye area.

description: Clinique Clarifying Lotion 1.0 Twice A Day Exfoliator is an alcohol-free exfoliating toner that promotes healthy, glowy skin. This dermatologist-developed formula clears away pollution, grime, and dead skin cells in order to reveal brighter, more radiant skin. At the same time, this lotion prepares dry, sensitive skin for the following steps in the skincare routine; in sum, this means dry skin is left more receptive to the hydrating actives present in moisturizing serums and creams.
how_to_use:
How to use
Twice a day, apply Clinique Clarifying Lotion 1.0 Twice A Day Exfoliator to a cotton pad, then sweep gently over the face and neck. Avoid the eye and lip areas. Proceed with your skincare routine as usual.

description:

This soothing toner utilizes the power of exfoliating acids, tea tree, and niacinamide to effectively target acne. description: One Thing Niacinamide 10% Toner 150ml (5.0 fl oz) is a focused skincare solution, specially formulated for those who prefer a minimalist approach to their skincare routine. In particular, this toner features 10% niacinamide as its key ingredient, emphasizing the philosophy of the brand to deliver only one thing and to focus on the essential elements that skin truly needs. Niacinamide is renowned for its multiple skin benefits. It plays a crucial role in regulating melanin production, which helps in achieving an even skin tone and helps in revitalizing and brightening dull skin. Moreover, it effectively moisturizes, thereby aiding in hydration and lending softness to the skin. But this ingredient goes beyond, with its soothing and sebum-regulating properties. As a result, this toner offers three main benefits. Firstly, it evens out the skin tone and boosts skin radiance. Secondly, it minimizes the appearance of pores, and thirdly it improves skin hydration and texture.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

10% Niacinamide, also known as Vitamin B3, is a great multitasker ingredient with several benefits. Firstly, it has brightening properties. Therefore, it helps to even out the skin tone and reduce the appearance of hyperpigmentation. This ingredient also contributes to diminishing dullness, revealing a more radiant complexion. Secondly, it has sebum-regulating benefits, reducing excess oil and minimizing the appearance of large pores. Lastly, this ingredient also offers moisturizing properties, consequently hydrating the skin and leaving it softer. It also offers soothing benefits and helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply One Thing Niacinamide 10% Toner 150ml (5.0 fl oz) to clean, dry skin after cleansing, with a cotton pad or reusable alternative. Alternatively, mix 5-10% with your skincare products on the palm of your hand (for example: 5 to 10 ml of this product with 100 ml cream). You can also soak a cotton/reusable pad with the product and apply it to the affected areas for 10 minutes. You can also transfer a portion of the toner to a small spray bottle to create your mist and spritz it whenever necessary.
